p.s: A woman by nature will be curious about where you live and what activities/hobbies you are interested in .
Women tend to be detail oriented and very observant so impress her with a clean and interesting apartment or room .
Make the effort and it will reward you in countless ways by improving on your relationships with all the females in your life .

list.item:
Start
to deep clean every room
.
What does that mean ?
Take the time to remove all trash and throw away , clear off furniture and dust , strip the bed of sheets and launder them , make the bed and change the towels , scrub your sink , shower and toilet .
Wash the floors and vacuum .
Wipe down the walls and counters with hot water and soap .
Windex the mirrors .
Toss the dirty laundry in a hamper in the closet .
Dust bookshelves .
The biggest turn off to many women is filth .
The room should look and smell fresh .
Toss the clutter .

item.s: Be alert to any funky smells-clean out the fridge .
Make it spotless .
Toss out any thing that smells bad .
If you have pets-really clean after them and remove any pet hair .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 2.jpg

list.item:
Write
down five interests/hobbies/passions that appeal to you on a piece of paper .
Some examples are outdoor living , sports , bikes , books , boats , art , skiing , film , travel , wine , photography , music , cars , cooking and nature .

item.s: Buy some bookshelves and fill them with books on these different interests .
You do n't have to spend a fortune , go to a used bookstore or a library sale .
Books are an insight into who you are and a great conversation starter .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 4.jpg

item.s: Add your CD and DVD collections to bookshelves but weed out any porn .
Include some romantic music and films .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 5.jpg

item.s: Invest in some candles but do n't overdo it and make sure they have saucers underneath them .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 6.jpg

item.s: Hang some pictures-black and white photos that are nicely framed are classic .
Try to avoid leaning them on the walls-actually hang them .
Get rid of naked women posters-its tacky .
Hang a poster or art that reflects your interests .
Cheap art can be found at local art shows .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 7.jpg

item.s: Realize that the goal in decorating is to express who you are but avoid the " one theme " rooms .
They can be corny .
Also try to pare down on excessive collections .
If you have 5,000 comic books-pick a few and box up the rest .
Try to show varied interests .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 8.jpg

item.s: Reflect your growing mind and hobbies .
If you always wanted to go to Italy or ski on the Alps .
Get books on Italy or posters of the Alps to remind you to keep the dream alive .
It is very romantic to see a man 's future plans .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 9.jpg

item.s: Avoid leaving sexual items around .
She knows you like sex , so you do n't have to prove to her you are a stud .
It makes you look like an idiot and too eager .
Throw away any ex-girlfriend 's pictures or items .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 10.jpg

item.s: Toss the ratty towels and invest in some good cotton ones .
Always have toilet paper and Kleenex on hand .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 11.jpg

item.s: Stock that clean fridge with water , diet coke and wine not just beer .
Have some fresh fruit and bread on the counter .
Invest in a coffee maker and coffee bean grinder .
Have milk and sugar in fridge for coffee .
Understand that your apartment is a reflection of who you are as a person .
Do n't let your date get bored because you have nothing interesting to look at or talk about .
Also keep your place updated , do n't keep old magazines and newspapers-buy new ones and change things around from time to time .

figure.rend: Impress Women With Your Apartment Step 13.jpg

item.s: If you have a fireplace-keep it clean and ready to use .
Try to make her feel as comfortable as possible .
Offer her a drink and take her coat .
In the bathroom-keep spare toothbrushes and new toothpaste .
Have both shampoo and conditioner in the shower .
In the kitchen-have napkins and clean glasses for both drinking and wine .
If she wants a beer-pour it in a glass .

list.item:
Turn down your answering machine volume and turn off the cell phone if possible .
Do n't keep checking your phone or computer .
It is rude .

item.s: Do n't clean or sweep in front of her when she arrives .
Focus your attention on her .
If she seems anxious to leave than take her to dinner or a movie .
Most women avoid unflattering lighting .
Try to place softer lighting in bedroom and living rooms .
Do n't blast her with music when she arrives-it is off putting .
Do n't keep a woman 's robe for " guests " .
It will make her feel like she is one of many .
When she arrives , offer to take her coat and hang it up .
Get her a drink and tell her to make herself at home .

list.item:
Ajax , Windex , Lysol , sponges , dust rags and hot water .
Toilet cleaner and a vacuum .
A broom and mop .

item.s: Trash can

list.item: A comfortable couch and nice coffee table
a double bed with a good mattress , sheets , comforter , towels and soft pillows
coffee beans and a coffee grinder
drinking glasses , coffee mugs , a corkscrew and wine glasses
